Debugging options for GameTest Framework.

== Syntax ==
:<code>script debugger close</code>
:: Close a debugger.
:<code>script debugger connect [host: string] [port: int]</code>
:: Connect to a debugger.
:<code>script debugger listen <port: int></code>
:: List a debugger.
:<code>script profiler start</code>
:: Start profiler.
:<code>script profiler stop</code>
:: Stop profiler.
:<code>script watchdog exportstats</code>
:: Export watchdog stats.

== Arguments ==
{{argument|be=1|host: string|basic_string}}
: Debugger's host
: {{arg desc|be=basic_string}}

{{argument|be=1|port: int|int}}
: Port of the debugger
: {{arg desc|be=int}}
